Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, i am Qeztotz, or Jamie Taylor (depends on what phase the mun is in), I am 17 years old and live in the heart of England.

I am not new to KSP however i am not a veteran, I have frequently visited the Mun and Minmus (and come back a few times too), i currently have 3 MunBases Active, i call them Alpha Beta and Gamma. I rarely visit other planets, and ive only got one unassisted landing on Duna. I have at about 20 ish spacestations scattered around kerbin and the Mun, an i am slowly creating a system whereby a 10 man shuttle can take you from the innermost station to the outermost in a realatively short space of time, i will, over time, expand this to allow Kerbals to have cheap-ish holidays on the Mun.

I consider myself to be an engineer and overseer rather than a pilot, (mainly cos im a terrible pilot) and i use MechJeb a hell of a lot. I make up for the lack of piloting skill with spaceship innovation, p much everything i make gets out of atmosphere and rarely seems to go wrong (other than pilot error) and i have complete confidence in my abilities to make interplanetary ships, i just dont want to at the moment, seems a bit naff compared to Minmus and the Mun really.

I like to draw a lot too, i have a deviantart account here: http://qeztotz.deviantart.com/ and i plan to do a Kerbal Space Program related Manga over the summer holidays, if youre interested in reading or helping out with it, please help add to this https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zmZgW430mLhzaPaCNjb7gcloPjVzQsnckyEyzytku6o/edit google drive document, the more the merrier.

Thats all ive got to say, i am ready to receive thrown 'welcome' spanners to the face.

Edited July 11, 2013 by Qeztotz
Forgot to put the link to the Drive Doc

Welcome! *fling!*

If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge an asteroid!

-Recieves spanner to the face

-floats backwards and enters airlock

-spanner hits the decompress button

-tragic music plays
